div.p: Arthur Vogan to the Royal Geographical Society of Australasia, Victorian Branch
A39, letter book, Victorian Branch, Royal Geographical Society of Australasia, Mitchell Library, State Library of New South Wales, Sydney.

For associated letter see Cheeseman to M, 2 June 1887.
Letter not in set, including backups, 20 April 1018 'Auckland, New Zealand'
[Application for position of artist on forthcoming New Guinea expedition.]
'Two mutual friends of mine & of Baron von Mueller's have written this mail to that gentleman pressing him to use his voice on my behalf.'
'The Auckland Institute who meet the day after the mail, that carries this, will forward to your society a recommendation of myself ... .'
'P.S. I have the honour of enclosing my photograph taken soon after my arrival from the last trip. I may mention I am not so thin now.'
